p: Mortality and the average number of days p.i. until death or endpoint euthanasia were analyzed by using ANOVA in the program GraphPad Prism version 5.0 (GraphPad Software Inc., La Jolla, CA); a P value of 0.05 or less was considered significant. Response variables that varied significantly by treatment group were further subjected to comparisons for all pairs by using the Tukey-Kramer test. Pairwise mean comparisons between inoculated and control groups were made using the Student t test.
